mapper.insert: INSERT INTO leave_request ( user_id, leave_type, start_date, end_date, reason, status ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{leaveType}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{reason}, #{status} )
mapper.select: SELECT leave_id, user_id, leave_type, start_date, end_date, reason, status, created_at, updated_at FROM leave_request WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE leave_request SET leave_type = #{vo.leaveType}, start_date = #{vo.startDate}, end_date = #{vo.endDate}, reason = #{vo.reason}, updated_at = SYSDATE WHERE leave_id = #{vo.leaveId} AND user_id = #{userId} AND status = 'PENDING'
